ValidationRule.description: Requires that the position of the assigned employee for a BOFE Legal referral is Legal
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
( Referral__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'BOFE_Civil_Litigation_Referral' || Referral__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'BOFE_Request_for_Legal_Court_Action' || Referral__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'BOFE_Request_for_Legal_Services' ) &&
NOT ( ISPICKVAL( Assigned_Employee__r.Position__c , 'Legal' ) || ISPICKVAL( Assigned_Employee__r.Title__c , 'Attorney') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can only assign a "Legal" employee to this type of referral
